title: [1.2.5]枪械Minecraft The Gun Mod (搬运)
author: powerho3
txt_content:
本帖最后由 powerho3 于 2012-4-28 17:41 编辑 


(在Minecraft 中文下载区,看到,去跟MC玩家分享~~


Minecraft.jar里面有一个叫META-INF记得删除~(邪恶的东西)如果不删除会导致黑黑

然后根据压缩包内指示安装
INSTALLATION
1. Place the folders and files in the "dotminecraft" directory directly into your .minecraft directory.
2. Place the folders and files in the "jar" directory directly into your minecraft.jar

1.在ZIP里面的第一个放进.minecraft 文件里

2.在ZIP里面第二个放进Minecraft jar 全部丢进去~ (自己大概大概写出来~不是机翻哦~ =x)

replies.author: 巧虎乐
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 巧虎乐 于 2012-10-7 07:08 编辑 

PM-5
[iron_ingot]+[bow]
UZI
[stick]+[gold_ingot]+[torch](火把就是手电筒)
MP7A1
[bow]+[fishing_rod](鱼竿是红外追踪系统)+[stone_pressureplate]+[lightstone]
SM-8
[mossy_cubblestone]+[grid_blaze_rod]+[bow]+[redstone_dust](红石是激光)
WA2000
[TNT](TNT会让此枪发出CS的AWP音效)+[repeater]+[compass](指南针会查找怪物)+[bow]+[dispenser]
RPD
[chest](箱子能像CS的M249储存超多弹药)+[bow]+[board](不用告示牌也行)+[iron_door]
G36C
[detector_rail]+[stick]++[iron_sword](注意！铁剑是刺刀呵呵呵。。。)+[chest]
